parameters: What's wrong, Karin? Are you feeling ill?

No... I'm not feeling unwell. But it seems like there's an
incredibly powerful demon deeper inside.

I don't know why, but my heart is beating faster. I felt
this when I first encountered a lesser demon, but I'm
certain there's an extraordinary foe ahead.

Understood. I don't know if it's intuition or something
else, but I'll trust what you say. Let's proceed with
caution and stay alert.
...Um... Can I ask you something before we go any further?

...? What is it, Karin? You're being so formal all of a
sudden.

Yugiri-chan, you seem to harbor an exceptional hatred
towards demons... Why is that?

This is enemy territory. We don't have the luxury to chat
leisurely.

(...It's not like a ninja of the shogunate's secret service
would casually talk about themselves.)

Well... If I were to say just one thing, it's that demons
are my enemies and my vendetta—I decided to exterminate all
of them when I was very young.

To bury all the demons in this world and create a place
where no one else has to live through what I did—that's my
purpose in life. Now, let's move on into the depths of the
cave. The demon leader is ahead, isn't he?

Yeah. Let's go—there seem to be many enemies from here on,
so let's be careful.
